StmtDBQueries.addbank: INSERT INTO Banks (logo, bank_code, bank_name, bank_address, bank_contact_name, bank_contact_phone, bank_contact_email) VALUES(@logo, @bank_code, @bank_name, @bank_address, @bank_contact_name, @bank_contact_phone, @bank_contact_email)
StmtDBQueries.editbank: UPDATE Banks SET logo=@logo, bank_name=@bank_name, bank_address=@bank_address, bank_contact_name=@bank_contact_name, bank_contact_phone=@bank_contact_phone, bank_contact_email=@bank_contact_email, status=@status, datemodified=getdate() WHERE bank_code=@bank_code
StmtDBQueries.getallbanks: SELECT logo, bank_code, bank_name, bank_address, bank_contact_name, bank_contact_phone, bank_contact_email, status FROM StatementDB.dbo.Banks
StmtDBQueries.getbank: SELECT logo, bank_code, bank_name, bank_address, bank_contact_name, bank_contact_phone, bank_contact_email, status FROM StatementDB.dbo.Banks where bank_code = @bankcode
StmtDBQueries.addaccount: INSERT INTO Accounts (account_no, account_name, bank_code) VALUES(@account_no, @account_name, @bank_code);
StmtDBQueries.editaccount: UPDATE Accounts SET account_name=@account_name, bank_code=@bank_code WHERE bank_code=@bank_code and account_no=@account_no
StmtDBQueries.getallaccounts: SELECT account_no, account_name, bank_code, current_balance, previous_balance, status FROM Accounts
StmtDBQueries.getaccount: SELECT logo, bank_code, bank_name, bank_address, bank_contact_name, bank_contact_phone, bank_contact_email, status FROM Accounts where bank_code = @bankcode
